explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions using machine learning algorithms, specifically the back propagation neural network based on gray wolf algorithm (GWO-BP) method.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses a back propagation neural network (BP) as part of its machine learning approach.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper mentions the use of back propagation neural network (BP), which involves backpropagation for training.
explanations.BP: The paper refers to the back propagation neural network (BP) method in its methodology.
